Class Histogram

  • public class Histogram
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a histogram for the given image-data
    Author:
    Alexander Johr u26865 m18927, Caroline Rühling u26864 m18926

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      returns the maximum of the image's histogram

      returns the maximum of the image's histogram, ignoring a count of values calculated by the given percentage

      returns the minimum of the image's histogram
